snippet: As a grunt who has seen war from the trenches, he would be the first enlisted, decorated combat veteran to be defense secretary.
abstract: Op-Ed article by journalist Myra MacPherson expresses support for former Sen Chuck Hagel's nomination to be secretary of defense; offers brief biography of Hagel, and explains way in which it qualifies him for job.
lead_paragraph: As a grunt who has seen war from the trenches, he would be the first enlisted, decorated combat veteran to be defense secretary.

headline.seo: Chuck Hagel, Under Attack, in Vietnam and on Capitol Hill

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
